creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: indigo field; multicolor DSWP; diamond bands at short ends; four bird and circle stripes, at each side of the two panels; bird, peacock and squirrel banding, seven; '0' and '1' within overall design
title: Man's tzute
